name: "Sweet Luster"
description: A streetlight scattered amidst the flowery sea, serving as a spot for one to rest briefly. It seems to be a naturally-grown plant, blending perfectly into the surrounding scenery. Every time night falls, the lamp shines with a warm glow akin to hundreds of dancing fireflies. After one has looked at it for a time, one might almost feel a light sweetness, as if one has drunk the clearest of dew-waters...
